testcase.classname: user enters text in search box and hints are displayed
testcase.name: : user sets filter
testcase.system-out: Given page contains search results for Soldering Irons......................passed When I set filter Brand with value Portasol.................................passed Then I can see product Portasol Gas Soldering Iron, 60W with part_number 10181060.passed And product count is 3......................................................passed When I set filter Wattage with value 125W...................................passed Then I can see product Portasol Gas Soldering Iron, 125W with part_number 11180070.passed And product count is 1......................................................passed When I add product Portasol Gas Soldering Iron, 125W with quantity 1 to basket.passed And I click checkout basket and confirm.....................................passed Then I get login popup......................................................passed
